text: Post is the second studio album by Icelandic rock singer Björk. She sent it out on June 7, 1995. It includes a mix of electronic and dance styles such as techno, trip hop and house but also ambient, jazz, industrial, and experimental music. Post was one of the most popular albums of Björk. It was ranked #26 in Spin magazine's "100 Greatest Albums, 1985–2005". == Related pages == * Media studies * Contemporary art Category:Björk albums Category:1995 albums
title: Post (album)
